name: Elf’s christmas candies smash – Educational game for kids from 5 years old
name_original: Elf’s christmas candies smash – Educational game for kids from 5 years old
description:
Christmas fun game for all ages. The goal is to help the elf Christmas toy factory to collect as many gifts and Christmas sweets and candy for Santa Claus then distributed to all the children of the world on Christmas Eve their unwanted Christmas gifts and fulfill the wishes and dreams of each and every one of the world's children
A set of 4 figures, removes an entire row or column
A set of 5 figures, the opportunity to exchange a color is obtained
A set of 5 T-shaped or L, a pump is obtained color! All Christmas balls of that color explode.
Get Bono, 1000 points you get a candy cane Christmas eliminates the figure you want.
You'll also find gelatin in the game! Figures should be released. Gathers figures catches and release them. Like you have to break wooden crates with figures captured in the interior.
You can buy a version without ads
